Title: Theme
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Castle Marrach is a game of romance, chivalry, and political intrigue. It appeals specifically to those with an interest in the Middle Ages and early Renaissance, with elements of fantasy and magic. Castle Marrach encourages a role-playing intensive atmosphere.
Advancement in Castle Marrach depends on the acquisition of Favor and knowledge rather than on increasing skill levels, slaying monsters, or winning gold. By your deeds, words, actions, and interactions you shall be known to others.
Castle Marrach is inspired by a variety of literary traditions, from the legendary romances of Arthurian times to the 20th century swashbuckling films of Errol Flynn. | {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | GES | Galactic Emperor: Succession is a science fiction game of intrigue, treachery, and war on an interstellar scale. The background is totally original but writers such as David Brin, Frank Herbert, Julian May, and Walter Jon Williams are among the influences.| Chat Theatres are built on a variety of themes, from creepy old Victorian houses to quiet oases in the middle of nowhere.}}
